price: 183 Ne lésez pas les autres dans leurs droits. Gardez-vous de répandre le mal sur terre.
arabic: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
